bs-watchlist-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of watchlist extension
bs-watchlist-pref-widgetlimit: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for limit of entries:
bs-watchlist-pref-widgetsortodr:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for sort by
{{Identical|Sort by}}
bs-watchlist-pref-sort-time:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], option for time
{{Identical|Time}}
bs-watchlist-pref-sort-title:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], option for title
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-desc:
Used in InsertMagic extension, tag description for "creates a list of pages which are on your watchlist and have a non-sighted change".
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-watchlist-window-watchlist-title: Title of a window that shows the current users watchlist
bs-watchlist-window-watchlist-intro: Intro text for a window that shows the current users watchlist
bs-watchlist-grid-watchlist-column-link-:
Header text of a column that shows links to wikipages
{{Identical|Paage}}
bs-watchlist-grid-watchlist-column-hasun: Header of column that holds information about whether a change on a watched page is unread
Tooltip for an icon that indicates whether a change on a watched page is unread
bs-watchlist-grid-watchlist-column-istal: Header of column that indicates whether a page is within a talk namespace
bs-watchlist-grid-watchlist-label-filter: Label for an input field that filters the list of watchlist entries by the page name
